name: grist
description: Grist is a spreadsheet-meets-database platform that offers workflows, data management, and custom views. It can be self-hosted and supports web interface editing, formulas, access control, and APIs.
features: Hybrid Platform: Combine spreadsheet familiarity with database power for structured data management.
Custom Views: Create multiple views of the same data including cards, calendars, and charts.
Formula Support: Use Python-based formulas for complex calculations and data transformations.
Access Control: Set granular permissions at document, table, and row levels for team collaboration.
API Integration: Programmatic access to data via REST API for automation and external integrations.
Workflow Automation: Build custom workflows with triggers, actions, and conditional logic.
Data Validation: Enforce data types, constraints, and relationships for data integrity.
Collaborative Editing: Real-time collaboration with multiple users editing simultaneously.
